resources.string: You have been successfully registered. We will try to call you as early as possible
Please check format of your details: Registration unsuccessful
What does the app do for you?

The Nigeria Telemedicine App helps you avail telemedicine health services just by making a few clicks. Once you\'re successfully registered with us please keep your mobile phone switched On so that the doctor can contact you as early as possible. Please enter correct details of yours so that we can reach you as early as possible.
How to use our health services?
You can use our health services very easily by following these simple 3 steps
STEP #1 - Click on the \"consult a doctor\" icon that is present just beside the \"help\" icon on the DashBoard that is your previous screen.
STEP #2 - A registration form opens up. Fill all the specified fields with correct details. Please make sure to add your dob in the specified format which is the dd/mm/yyyy format.

STEP #3 - After filling all your details correctly press the green register button. Wait for a few seconds. If a successful registration alert appears then you have successfully registered with us and if an un-successful message appears that means you have to start again from step 1.
